dublin_core.dcvalue: Earlier we have shown that the mobile phone radiation radiofrequency modulated electromagnetic fields RF EMF alters protein expression in human endothelial cell line This does not mean that similar response will take place in human body exposed to this radiation Therefore in this pilot human volunteer study using proteomics approach we have examined whether a local exposure of human skin to RF EMF will cause changes in protein expression in living people
Mobile phone radiation might alter protein expression in human skin.
